Texts.Chs: 修复后的最终幸存者的笔记
Texts.Eng: A recovered note from an Apex survivor.

Texts.Chs: 不久之后一切变得更糟了，他们不仅强迫我们服劳役，甚至...吃了我们当中的一部分人，我亲眼看到Rathcher在上周二被吃了！他们不讲人权，不留余地...带来的只有死亡和奴役。我们要怎样才能活下去？就算活到最后又有什么意义？
Texts.Eng: It wasn't long before things got worse. Rather than make us work, they would just...eat some of us at random. I watched Rathcher get devoured last Tuesday. No checks and balances were made, no concessions...just death and servitude. How are we to survive? And what will be left of us?

Texts.Chs: 我们从未见过这样的生物！他们好似来自恐怖片，从天而降，用可怕的等离子武器燃烧我们的大气，从飞船中鱼贯而出，先屠杀了我们的老一辈人，再强迫那些年轻人服劳役，大多数年轻人都因此而死，即使有人苟活了下来，也常常被他们因为“工作不合格”杀死。
Texts.Eng: They came from the sky, blazing our very atmosphere with their terrible plasma weapons. We'd never seen anything like these creatures, stepping out of their ships as if from some aquatic horror show! First they killed the eldest, and then forced the younger ones to work. Most did not survive the effort, and those that did were often killed for 'incorrectly' working.
